// SV_Position              0   xyzw        5      POS   float   xyzw

vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[181], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[4], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[3066], dynamicIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb3[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyz
dcl_output o0.xyz
dcl_output o1.xyz
dcl_output o2.xyz
dcl_output o3.xyz
dcl_output o4.xy
dcl_output_siv o5.xyzw, position
dcl_temps 5

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mad r0.xyz, v2.zyxz, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, -1.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
dp3 r1.x, r0.xyzx, cb3[0].xyzx
dp3 r1.y, r0.xyzx, cb3[1].xyzx
dp3 r1.z, r0.xyzx, cb3[2].xyzx
imul null, r0.x, v0.w, l(3)
dp3 r2.x, r1.xyzx, cb2[r0.x + 0].xyzx
dp3 r2.y, r1.xyzx, cb2[r0.x + 1].xyzx
dp3 r2.z, r1.xyzx, cb2[r0.x + 2].xyzx
dp3 r0.y, r2.xyzx, r2.xyzx
rsq r0.y, r0.y
mul o0.xyz, r0.yyyy, r2.xyzx
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
itof r0.yzw, v0.xxyz
mad r2.xyz, r0.yzwy, cb1[3].yyyy, cb1[3].xxxx
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 0].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 1].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 2].xyzw
dp4 r3.x, r1.xyzw, cb3[0].xyzw
dp4 r3.y, r1.xyzw, cb3[1].xyzw
dp4 r3.z, r1.xyzw, cb3[2].xyzw
add r0.yzw, r3.xxyz, -cb0[174].xxyz
mov o3.xyz, r3.xyzx
mul r1.x, r0.z, cb0[58].y
mul r1.y, r0.z, cb0[59].y
mul r1.z, r0.z, cb0[60].y
mul r1.w, r0.z, cb0[61].y
mad r3.x, r0.w, cb0[58].z, cb0[58].w
mad r3.y, r0.w, cb0[59].z, cb0[59].w
mad r3.z, r0.w, cb0[60].z, cb0[60].w
mad r3.w, r0.w, cb0[61].z, cb0[61].w
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r3.xyzw
mul r3.x, r0.y, cb0[58].x
mul r3.y, r0.y, cb0[59].x
mul r3.z, r0.y, cb0[60].x
mul r3.w, r0.y, cb0[61].x
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r3.xyzw

// Relocated to here with asmtool.py
mov o5.xyzw, r1.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 2079d29f4db25114-vs.txt
ne r4.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r4.w
  add r4.w, r1.w, -r4.y
  mad r1.x, r4.w, r4.x, r1.x
endif

mul o1.xyz, r1.xywx, l(0.500000, -0.500000, 1.000000, 0.000000)

// mov o5.xyzw, r1.xyzw // Relocated from here with asmtool.py

dp4 r1.x, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 1533].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 1534].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r2.xyzw, cb2[r0.x + 1535].xyzw
mul o4.xy, r2.xyxx, cb0[180].wwww
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, r1.xyzw, cb4[0].xyzw
dp4 r0.y, r1.xyzw, cb4[1].xyzw
dp4 r0.z, r1.xyzw, cb4[2].xyzw
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, r0.xyzw, cb0[20].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r0.xyzw, cb0[21].xyzw
dp4 o2.z, r0.xyzw, cb0[23].xyzw
mul o2.xy, r1.xyxx, l(0.500000, -0.500000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
ret 
// Approximately 53 instruction slots used
